name: Education
description: School Type: Elementary School Serves grades: TK, K, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 - Special Education: Resource Specialist Program Services - Academic Enrichment: 1:1 student Chromebooks, Computer carts, Culinary program, Library, Mission Science Workshop program, Technology teacher - Arts Enrichment: Art Class, Cooking or home economics, Drama, Instrumental music, Music program, Performing arts, Theater, Visual and Performing Arts (VAPA), Visual arts, Writing or poetry

howToGetIt: Interested families, please use online TOOL to schedule campus tour. During tour you will be given all appropriate application information. For Questions or more information regarding tours email: tours@harverymilkpfc.org
